name: .AVA File Extension
summary: Learn about .AVA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: eBook file used by AvaaPlayer, an eBook reading software localized in Persian; can be opened with the Windows or Android version of AvaaPlayer software and can be synced across devices using the AvaaBook online services; allows book publishers to store and distribute digital books.
